agents.name: Astra
agents.description: Astra is a versatile Controller who uses her stars to manipulate the battlefield with her smokes, gravity wells, and a powerful cosmic divide.

abilities.name: Gravity Well
abilities.description: Astra's Gravity Well is a device that pulls in enemies and creates a burst of force, disrupting the enemy’s movements.

abilities.name: Nebula
abilities.description: Nebula allows Astra to create a large sphere of smoke, providing cover and blocking vision.

abilities.name: Stars
abilities.description: Astra uses Stars as a tool to manipulate the map, including the Gravity Well and Nebula abilities.

abilities.name: Cosmic Divide
abilities.description: Astra's ultimate ability, Cosmic Divide, creates a massive divide that blocks sound and vision, giving Astra’s team control of a large area.

agents.name: Jett
agents.description: Jett is a fast-moving, high-damage Duelist who excels at agile playstyles with abilities that allow her to dash and control the air.

abilities.name: Cloudburst
abilities.description: Jett uses Cloudburst to throw a small cloud of smoke, providing cover for herself and her team.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: Tailwind is Jett’s mobility ability that lets her dash quickly across the map, repositioning or escaping danger.

abilities.name: Updraft
abilities.description: Updraft lets Jett propel herself vertically, gaining a high ground advantage.

abilities.name: Ultimate: Tailwind
abilities.description: Jett's ultimate ability allows her to unleash an incredibly rapid dash with more aggressive positioning.

agents.name: Sage
agents.description: A Chinese healer who provides sustainability and control with barriers and healing abilities.

agents.name: Gekko
agents.description: A street-smart initiator from Los Angeles who commands a crew of chaotic creatures to flush enemies and take control of the battlefield.
